## `AddTest` {#batch-addtest}

Adds a test to the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean AddTest(Test test)

boolean AddTest(string test)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
[`Test`](#test)/`string` test | The test to add. (For a custom test, use the name of the test.)

### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

`true` if the test was successfully added; otherwise, `false`.
